availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Rumsey, Kentucky, painter. Maryland native. Married Frances H. Calloway in McLean County, Kentucky on October 20, 1855. Painter in Rumsey in 1860. Physician in McLean County, Kentucky, in 1864.

bibl.p:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Rumsey, p. 13. Dodd, Jordan, comp. Kentucky, Compiled Marriages, 1851-1900 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2001, McLean County, Kentucky. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Archive Volume Number: 2 of 4, McLean County, Kentucky, p. 16, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Dr Michael J. Keplinger (1829-1889), Memorial #20419890, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=20419890&ref=acom (accessed March 24, 2017).
